text: César Batista (born 6 October 1928) is a Portuguese former sports shooter. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Portuguese male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Portugal Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Fundão, Portugal
title: César Batista
